name: FTG Technologies
tag_list: avaya, cisco, extreme, boston, unified-communications, uc, ccie
overview:
FTG Technologies provides comprehensive design, implementation and support services for communications and networking solutions from industry leading partners including Avaya, Cisco, and Extreme Networks.

Drawing on a rich heritage of enterprise telephony and mastery of IP-based technologies, FTG designs, delivers and supports enterprise class unified communications, data networking and video conferencing solutions. Our full scope of services provides clients with a trusted team of exerts to support their entire technology portfolio. From cable infrastructure and wireless - to contact center and applications; FTG has you covered. One call provides complete coverage from the team you can trust.
